news_header: Orange Belgium Group reported a net profit of 17.2 million euros for fiscal 2024, reversing a loss from the previous year.
news_original_title: Orange Belgium FY24 EBITDAaL Rises; Total Revenues Up 1.7%
news_text: Orange Belgium Group announced a net profit of 17.2 million euros for fiscal 2024, compared to a loss of 10.8 million euros in the previous year. Earnings per share were 0.33 euros, up from breakeven last year. Operating profit increased to 118.9 million euros from 78.8 million euros, and EBITDAaL rose by 10.1% to 544.3 million euros. Revenues for fiscal 2024 reached 1.99 billion euros, up from 1.75 billion euros. The Board will not propose a dividend for fiscal 2024. For fiscal 2025, the company aims for an EBITDAaL between 545 million euros and 565 million euros.
